name: Mask-querade Pong
description:
How To Play:

W/S Keys: Control Aku Aku up/down

Up Arrow/Down Arrow: Control Uka Uka up/down

Objective: Get 10 points to win the game

Uka Uka: https://www.deviantart.com/bandicootbrawl96/art/Uka-Uka-It-s-About-Time-Render-8...

Aku Aku: https://www.deviantart.com/bandicootbrawl96/art/Aku-Aku-Mobile-Render-839385866

Background: https://www.iamag.co/the-art-of-crash-bandicoot-4-its-about-time/crash-bandicoot...

Wumpa Fruit: https://crashbandicoot.fandom.com/wiki/Wumpa_Fruit
